", "answer": "The purpose of the Early Intervention Centres is to provide effective support and intervention for children with Autism at an early age. "}, {"question": "Where are the Early Intervention Centres located? ", "answer": "The Early Intervention Centres are located in various districts including Chennai, Tiruchirapalli, Tirunelveli, Kanniyakumari, Thanjavur, Kancheepuram, Thiruvallur, Salem, Namakkal, Madurai, Erode, Coimbatore, Vellore, Thuthukudi, Villupuram, Virudhunagar, Cuddalore, Dindigul, and Thiruvannamalai.
